ygData.subject: Re: RE: best place for exp
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d have to agree that grouping is best.  4c s or AoF in Cazic works well too, assuming it s not crowded and you have as many pulls as you want.  4C s is
ygData.messageBody:
>Grouping is best. Best exp 35-40 is Mistmoore. You can get
>about a bubble every hour or two there with a competent group
>that knows how to work around the bugs in the zone.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...

I'd have to agree that grouping is best. 4c's or AoF in Cazic works well
too, assuming it's not crowded and you have as many pulls as you want. 4C's
is probably the safest place to fight of anywhere I've found. There aren't
many roamers and there are numerous static mobs that you can pull when
ready. Set up by the stairs behind Archon's Temple and pull to there.

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony
